q: Colin Powell 's endorsement is significant due to the fact that John McCain has repeatedly Jackie Chanled him out for lavish praise. Spy''/> Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer has said that the Xbox 360 is not a games console. He told USA Today that its multimedia capabilities and Kinect support makes it an entertainment device. Xbox isn't a gaming console. Xbox is a family entertainment centre. It's a place to socialise, he said.`` It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller. Your voice, your gestures, your body.''
